title: Feng Shui Calculator
disclaimer: It's just for fun. Please don't take the results too seriously!
badFengShui: Bad Feng Shui (Major Adjustment or Remediation Needed)

doorDirection.label: Door Direction
doorDirection.info: The direction the main door opens from inside the house.

doorWest.label: Door facing west
doorWest.suggestion: Consider adjusting the door orientation or adding barriers to improve air flow.

doorNorth.label: Door facing north
doorNorth.suggestion: Consult a Feng Shui master for solutions based on actual situation.

doorMingTang.label: Bright hall in front of door (flat ground, pond, or green grass)

doorLongCorridorStreet.label: Door directly facing long corridor or street (including both inside and outside)
doorLongCorridorStreet.suggestion: Set up a screen or large plant inside the door to block and reduce direct air rush.

doorElevatorStaircase.label: Door directly facing elevator or staircase (including both inside and outside)
doorElevatorStaircase.suggestion: Place round, large plants or screens at the door to cushion.

doorPlantPainting.label: Seeing plants or inspiring artwork upon entry

doorSeeMirror.label: Seeing mirror upon entry
doorSeeMirror.suggestion: Adjust the mirror position so it doesn't directly reflect the view from the door.

entrywaySharpCorner.label: Sharp corner in entryway (excluding right-angle walls or objects)
entrywaySharpCorner.suggestion: Place tall plants or set up a screen at the sharp corner to neutralize negative energy.

livingSofaBackWater.label: Sofa backed by water or fish tank
livingSofaBackWater.suggestion: Adjust the sofa to back against solid wall or add screen for support.

livingSofaFaceDoor.label: Sofa directly facing door
livingSofaFaceDoor.suggestion: Adjust sofa angle or use partition to reduce evil qi.

livingDirectLight.label: Overhead light shining directly on head
livingDirectLight.suggestion: Relocate the light or use soft light shade.

livingColumn.label: Isolated column blocking air flow
livingColumn.suggestion: Enclose the column with furniture or attach landscape painting to resolve.

bedFaceWest.label: Bed head facing west
bedFaceWest.suggestion: Adjust bed head direction to avoid blood rushing to head.

bedFaceMirror.label: Bed facing mirror
bedFaceMirror.suggestion: Adjust mirror position or cover with cloth.

studyDoorKitchenBathroom.label: Door facing kitchen or bathroom
studyDoorKitchenBathroom.suggestion: Adjust study door orientation or add screen to block water-fire conflict.

studyWallBathroom.label: Desk back or face wall of bathroom
studyWallBathroom.suggestion: Move desk to avoid bathroom wall.

kitchenSouth.label: Kitchen facing south
kitchenSouth.suggestion: Consider adjusting kitchen position or adding partition to reduce fire qi.

kitchenStoveBadFacing.label: Stove directly facing door, bedroom, or bathroom
kitchenStoveBadFacing.suggestion: Adjust stove position to avoid collision with door.

diningRoundSquare.label: Dining table is round or square

diningSharpTable.label: Dining table is triangular or has sharp corners
diningSharpTable.suggestion: Replace table with round or square to improve qi field.

diningDoorCollision.label: Dining table directly hit by door or bathroom
diningDoorCollision.suggestion: Adjust table position or set up screen to resolve evil qi.
